infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Enable SipStir to access your Camera so we can upload your photos and save photos you've taken with the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This allows us to more easily suggest venues and friends in your area.  It personalizes the discovery and guessing process.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This allows us to more easily suggest venues and friends in your area.  It personalizes the discovery and guessing process.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Enable SipStir to access your Photo Library so we can upload your photos and save photos you've taken with the app.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

plugins.iosUserTrackingPermission: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
